member.summary: Specifies whether to embed images as Base64 strings in the generated HTML documents or not. By default set to true.
member.remarks: If this property is set to false, images will be generated in the same folder as the generated HTML files. Note that for some platforms like Silverlight this is not possible due to security reasons.
